# include<stdio.h>
# include<string.h>
# define sc scanf
# define pr printf
# define Int long long int
main()
{
Int n,k,l,p,r,q,m,t;
char s[12];
while(1)
{
    sc("%s",s);
    if(s[0]=='#')return 0;
    l=strlen(s);
    n=0;
    for(k=0;k<l;k++)
    {
        n*=10;
        n+=(s[k]-48);
    }
    k=0;
    p=9;
    q=1;
    t=1;
    while(k+(p*q)<n)
    {
        k+=(p*q);
        p*=10;
        q++;
        t*=10;
    }
    l=0;
    r=p;
    while(l<r)
    {
        m=(l+r)/2;
        if(k+(m*q)<n)l=m+1;
        else r=m;
    }
    if(k+r*q==n)pr("%lld\n",t-1+r);
    else pr("Impossible!\n");
}
return 0;
}
